dict.acceptation: 仆人，佣人，雇工；[美]奴仆，奴隶；官吏，公务员，服务员；随员，献身…的人；

sent.orig: Civil servant law in china is the first law which carries in management of civil servant.
sent.trans: 《公务员法》是我国首次以法律的形式就公务员队伍的管理进行的立法，该法进行了许多里程碑式的创新。

sent.orig: What more can David say to you for honoring your servant? For you know your servant.
sent.trans: 你加于仆人的尊荣，我还有何言可说呢？因为你知道你的仆人。

sent.orig: A king delights in a wise servant, but a shameful servant incurs his wrath.
sent.trans: 智慧的臣子，蒙王恩惠。贻羞的仆人，遭其震怒。

sent.orig: Public Servant Law has brought the training work of public servant into the legal track.
sent.trans: 《公务员法》的颁布使公务员培训工作纳入了法制化的轨道。

sent.orig: And Laban gave Zilpah his female servant to his daughter Leah to be her female servant.
sent.trans: 24拉班又将自己的婢女悉帕给女儿利亚作使女。
